short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that lets you select html and copy screenshot to clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For UI UX designers, quickly select a website portion and an image will be copied in your clipboard. 

Paste that image in Figma, Jira, Trello, Messenger, Whatsapp, Email, or anywhere you like.

Give design feedback to your developers very quickly.

Visit https://isneuu.com for more information.

Limitations: 
Sometimes the actual font is not copied in the image. And the Screenshot might glitch only showing half of it.

Data collection: 
The extension only tracks anonymous "clicked" activity so that I can see if users are using it or not. This won't disclose your privacy or what you do. Your data is completely your own. I just want to know if people are using the app or not. :)
